title: Forever Different: A Memoir of One Woman's Journey Living with Bipolar Disorder
description: An uncut, raw and gripping story of one woman's life struggle with the extreme highs and lows of Bipolar I Disorder. The denial of her diagnosis and the eventual acceptance of her medication and disease. She takes us from her innocence as a child to her adult criminal lifestyle, which led to a subsequent 70 month federal prison sentence for securities fraud. A tale so unbelievable and elements so disturbing, you would swear you were reading fiction.
author: Christine F. Anderson
